title: Recipe Ratings Analysis
description: Analyzed how sugar content affects recipe ratings using hypothesis testing, linear regression, and data visualization techniques.

title: Loan Default Prediction
description: Built predictive models using logistic regression and decision trees to assess loan default risk based on LendingClub data.

title: Bike Cycle Sync
description: An interactive D3 + Mapbox visualization showing Boston bike traffic patterns, station flows, and volume by time of day.

title: Consulting Project
description: Collaborated with a data science client to design and deliver weekly reports, educational content, and analytical recommendations.

title: Climate Change Visualization
description: Visualized global greenhouse gas emissions data using D3.js and identified trends across countries from 1990 to 2020.

title: Credit Fraud Prediction
description: Trained ensemble models to predict creditworthiness and compared model performance using precision-recall metrics.

title: Chatbot for Healthcare AI
description: Created a healthcare chatbot prototype capable of answering symptom-based queries using basic NLP techniques.

title: Dancing Teacher AI App
description: Designed an AI-powered app that uses pose detection to provide real-time feedback on dance movement accuracy.

title: Tweet Sentiment Analysis
description: Used NLP and supervised learning to classify tweets by sentiment and explored text feature extraction methods.

title: Webscraping For Course Analysis
description: Scraped CAPE data to analyze student satisfaction trends across UCSD courses, instructors, and departments.

title: Movie Recommendation System
description: Developed a basic recommendation engine using collaborative filtering and cosine similarity on movie ratings.

title: Exploring Abortion Rates Across U.S. States
description: Analyzed publicly available health datasets to investigate abortion access and policy impact across states.
